name: Frog 'N Roll
description:
it's a frog rock concert! the frogs wear hats! what more could you want!

*press the blue fullscreen button on the bottom right for the best experience

            all art (minus the drum image lol) and music is original!

stay tuned for new music, SFX, potential new clothes options & animations (when i figure out how to do that :D) in the future!

Controls

Mouse: Select
